Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 309th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Brian Eppinger (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2015, off Byron Serra (DET)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,128,571 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 4/23/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2016, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2016, hitting .327 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2016, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/9/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $3,095,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 7/25/2017.
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2018, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 4/23/2018 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/2/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2019, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 7/20/2020 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/4/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $2,333,333 per year...
Traded from New York to Philadelphia on 3/2/2022 (Going to NY: LF Joel Santillo. Going to PHI: RF Douglas Daubert)...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/9/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $1,900,000 per year...
Injured on 5/14/2023 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
